question_template: A1 shoots %s free throw. Before the ball has touched the ring, B1 reaches through the basket from below and touches the ball.
answers: 1 point to A1 and technical foul on B1
the free throw shall be repeated and a technical foul called on B1

explanation: I31-1 When the ball is above the ring during a shot for a field goal or a free-throw attempt, it is interference if a player reaches through the basket from below and touches the ball. R36.3.1 A technical foul is a player non-contact foul of a behavioural nature including, but not limited to: [...] Goaltending during the last or only free throw by a defensive player. The offensive team shall be awarded 1 point, followed by the technical foul penalty charged against the defensive player.
